templates.title: WXWA
templates.description: WXWA setup as a compose file

env.name: CONTAINER_NAME
env.label: Name of  Container
env.description: Unique Name of container that is using for identification in Portainer

env.name: INSTANCE
env.label: Api instance number
env.description: Must be unique Instance number that is using for pai conaction https://DOMAIN/<instance> (e.g 01235)

env.name: TOKEN
env.label: Api token
env.description: Api token random string of  letters and  numbers, no spaces, no special chars
